thread.title: Photos: Alia Bhatt, Sidharth Malhotra & Varun Dhawan Spend Holi Together
thread.title_full: Photos: Alia Bhatt, Sidharth Malhotra & Varun Dhawan Spend Holi Together

author: Divya Rao
title: Photos: Alia Bhatt, Sidharth Malhotra & Varun Dhawan Spend Holi Together

organizations.name: sidharth malhotra & varun dhawan spend holi

text:
A post shared by Sidharth Malhotra (@s1dofficial) on Mar 13, 2017 at 6:01am PDT 
Student Of The Year actors – Varun Dhawan , Alia Bhatt and Sidharth Malhotra – had a sort of reunion yesterday at a Holi bash in the city. Varun and Alia have been busy promoting their latest release Badrinath Ki Dulhania and even attended some Holi events for the same. Sidharth joined in on the fun later and the three partied with their friends. Check out the photos. Alia Bhatt, Sidharth Malhotra
